channel.title: CVE Feed for AccessPress Themes -- Access Demo Importer (WordPress plugin)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AccessPress Themes -- Access Demo Importer (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2022-23975|2024-08-03T03:59:23.306Z -- accesspress%20themes -- access%20demo%20importer%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) in Access Demo Importer <= 1.0.7 on WordPress allows an attacker to activate any installed plugin.

item.title: CVE-2022-23976|2024-08-03T03:59:23.287Z -- accesspress%20themes -- access%20demo%20importer%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) in Access Demo Importer <= 1.0.7 on WordPress allows an attacker to reset all data (posts / pages / media).
